title: Be careful with op.gg extension from chrome
body:
Riot Games changed something in their program, which detects user, who uses illegal third party programs, because now u getting banned for using the op.gg extension for chrome. i got banned on one account for botting  then changed account. Played one game got banned for botting after game also. Then changed account again but i deleted the extension before then played another game and nothing happened.

edit: got my accounts back so i guess they realized the problem
